com.jayomail.template.HTMLTemplate

    Package Description
    com.jayomail.template  

    • Uses of HTMLTemplate in com.jayomail.template

      Methods in com.jayomail.template that return HTMLTemplate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HTMLTemplate HTMLTemplate.loadFromFile(String filePath)
      Loads HTML content from a file and sets it as the template content.
      HTMLTemplate HTMLTemplate.loadFromUrl(String url)
      Loads HTML content from a URL and sets it as the template content.
      HTMLTemplate HTMLTemplate.setTemplate(String content)
      Sets the content of the HTML template.
      HTMLTemplate HTMLTemplate.setValue(String key, String value)
      Replaces a placeholder in the template with a specified value.
